scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p artifacts && echo "📦 Saving build + logs..." && (test -f railway.log && cp railway.log artifacts/railway-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).log || echo "⚠️ No railway.log found, creating placeholder" && echo "[NO LOGS AVAILABLE]" > artifacts/railway-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).log) && tar -czf artifacts/younite-logs-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz artifacts/railway-*.log
